0: My friend showed me pictures of his kids
1: And all I could show him was pictures of my cribs
2: He said his daughter got a brand new report card
3: And all I got was a brand new sports car, oh
4: Dad cracked a joke, all the kids laughed
5: But I couldn't hear him all the way in first class
6: Chased the good life my whole life long
7: Look back on my life and my life gone
9: My god-sister getting married by the lake
10: But I couldn't figure out who I'd wanna take
11: Bad enough that I showed up late
12: I had to leave before they even cut the cake
title: Welcome To Heartbreak
